Header: AAST Delegates Pay Homage to Sri Dalada Maligawa
Content: Major General Suchindra Kumar, Head of the Indian Army delegation who attended the recent Army to Army Staff Talks (AAST) sessions paid his homage to the sacred Sri Dalada Mailigawa (Temple of Tooth), together with his retinue on Wednesday (12). The visitors joined the offerings with Colonel W.B.W.M.R.S.T Aluvihare, 111 Brigade Commander of the 11 Division at the temple premises. Later on, Major General T.J Nanayakkara, General Officer Commanding, 11 Division joined the visitors in the evening after they went on a sight-seeing tour in the Kandy suburbs. Several Senior Officers were associated with the dayâ€™s itinerary of the visitors.
